text: Paula Vogel (born November 16, 1951) is an American playwright. She won the 1998 Pulitzer Prize for Drama for her play How I Learned to Drive. From 2008 to 2012, Vogel was a professor at the Yale School of Drama. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:American playwrights Category:Yale University faculty Category:Writers from Washington, D.C. title: Paula Vogel
